data.title: Virginia Heraldica Por William Armstrong Crozier - Vol 5 - 1907
data.meta_description:
Virginia Heraldica Por William Armstrong Crozier - Vol 5 - 1907 - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. The document provides information on the coats of arms and genealogies of several Virginia families, including:

- Adams of New Kent county, with arms of ermine three cats passant in pale azure. 

- Allen of Surry county, with arms of per chevron gules and ermine, in chief two lions' heads erased or and crest of a horse's head. 

- Bray of James City county, with arms of azure a chevron between three eagles legs erased a la cuisse sable, armed gules and crest of an ounce.

It also briefly mentions arms and lineages of other Virginia families such as Jett, Keeble, English, Abra
